bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition Combined Designation of gan 疳 , gan- illness, and zhi 痔 , piles. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry qiu 楸 quoting Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 : 傅惡瘡疽瘺，癰腫疳野雞病 , “Externally apply to malign sores, impediment-illnesses, fistula, obstruction-illnesses, swelling, gan -illness and chicken disease”. writes: 惡瘡疽瘺，癰腫疳痔 , “Malign sores, impediment-illnesses, fistula, obstruction-illnesses, swelling, gan- illness and piles ”.
